channel.title: what age you first played hl1?
channel.description:
how old were you when you played hl the first time what did you think of the game and a comment would be appreciated
me? age of 10 and i was really interested by the game took me more then a year to complete i aspecially like jumping head crabs dont know why :fffuuu::3
edit : sowwie the title didnt come out bold im just new to this website

CatzEyes93:

So I wasnt the oldest? :s niffle:

item.source: what age you first played hl1?

item.title: what age you first played hl1?
item.dc:creator: PharCry
item.description:
I started playing HL when it came out (I was… 5?) I am not sure… Somewhere around where Windows 98 (Maybe we still had 95… ) made me want to kill someone. Anyway… I didn’t get past Office Complex though because I was… well… a 5 year old with ADHD and I couldn’t stay focused on it :facepalm: . Anyway… I re-bought the game off steam a few months ago… (Oh okay… I got the HLS version… :3 ) Anyway… I played it again and I think I beat it on Normal in 10-12 hrs? I don’t know… I know it was early morning and I didn’t go pee until I beat the game at around 8PM… Great game. 95/100. However yes… I started it when it came out and I beat it a few months ago.

(Please note I only said 95/100, because I am not gonna give a full 100 when someday another great (maybe greater) game may come out and it makes no sense to give 101/100 (1 1/100) :meh: .)

Read full topic
item.source: what age you first played hl1?
